trigg_desc: If X days have elapsed after lead generation, and yet first meeting has not been conducted (applicable for all leads with status "New" with a future meeting date)
thres_description: X- (Average # days for segment between lead generation and conduct of first meeting)+ 1
thres_query_logic:
SELECT fls_id, DATEDIFF(first_meeting_scheduled_date, lead_generation_date) + 1 AS TAT
FROM lead_table
WHERE LOWER(lead_status) = 'new'
  AND updated_dttm >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), {})
  AND (meeting_setup_date IS not NULL OR meeting_setup_date <> 'null')

trigg_desc: 000000000000000If average time between lead generation and first meeting has been greater than X for the last Y leads for the FLS
thres_description: X- (Average # days for segment/fls between lead generation and conduct of first meeting)+ 1
thres_query_logic: select fls_id, datediff(latest_meeting_scheduled_date,lead_generation_date)+1 AS TAT from lead_tableWHERE updated_dttm >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), {})

trigg_desc: If Last N month's avg TAT between lead generation and set up of meeting has been greater than segment benchmark X
thres_description: X- (Average # days for segment between lead generation and setup of first meeting)+ 1
thres_query_logic: select fls_id, datediff(meeting_setup_date,lead_generation_date)+1 AS TAT from lead_table WHERE updated_dttm >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), {})

trigg_desc: If x days have elapsed since application login and application is still pending for verification
thres_description: X- Segment average TAT for last N days  from login till conversion
thres_query_logic:
SELECT lead_table.fls_id,
datediff(policy_table.policy_issuance_date,lead_table.application_login_date) as TAT
FROM lead_table
LEFT JOIN policy_table AS policy_table ON lead_table.fls_id = policy_table.fls_id
WHERE lead_table.updated_dttm >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), {});

thres_description: X% - Segment average rider conversion rate for past N months

trigg_desc: If number of self generated leads in the last month is less than x
thres_description: X - 1.2 * Segment average of # self generated leads
thres_query_logic: select fls_id, 1 AS TAT from lead_table WHERE updated_dttm >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), {})

trigg_desc: If the FLS doesn't have more than 1 open application
If there is a look-in cancellation request against the customer id XX  and diff of current date and lookin cancellation request date is not greater than 6 months
If there is a lead A with "Follow Up" status against FLS
If the FLS is more than N months old in system
thres_description: X= Average EPI of the segment for N months data

trigg_desc: If there has been no application logged in by FLS in past X days
thres_description: X->Average time taken((lead_generation - issuance_date)  to sell 1 policy in the segment in last N days
thres_query_logic:
SELECT lead_table.fls_id,
datediff(policy_table.policy_issuance_date,lead_table.lead_generation_date) as TAT
FROM lead_table
LEFT JOIN policy_table AS policy_table ON lead_table.fls_id = policy_table.fls_id
WHERE lead_table.updated_dttm >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), {});

trigg_desc: If there is an open medical FR
If x days have elapsed since medical FR was raised
thres_description: X- Segment average TAT for medical FR closure (From FR raise till document submission by FLS)
thres_query_logic: select fls_id, datediff(fr_close_date,fr_generation_date) AS TAT from fr_table WHERE lower(fr_med_nonmed) = 'med' AND updated_dttm >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), {})

trigg_desc: If Last N Day's avg TAT for medical FR Closing is greater than segment benchmark X
thres_description: X- Segment average TAT for medical FR closure (From FR raise till document submission by FLS)
thres_query_logic: select fls_id, datediff(fr_close_date,fr_generation_date) AS TAT from fr_table WHERE lower(fr_med_nonmed) = 'med' AND updated_dttm >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), {})
